body: This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/862)

comment_regular_data.body: What about the persistent groupchats PR?

--- Reviewed 6 of 6 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/862#-:-L9KjnnT3r-4NeoOc4US:b-jbsf8z)*
@SkyzohKey it needs tests. There are a few PRs merged in 0.2.2, so we'll release this version now.
Can we switch groupbot to use persistent groups? That way more people will be able to test it easier. Tens of people use groupbot every day, so we could ask some of them for help with testing.

Also blocked by the autotools build being broken in master. You will want to cherry-pick this commit that fixes it before making a release https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/pull/867/commits/90202a1c4793c359ce557be32286c7bc0d9fef2a. It's part of https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/pull/867 but I see that that PR might not make it in 0.2.2, so just cherry-pick.

It would also be nice to get https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/pull/875 in before the release, so that we could see if bootstrap node maintainers update the nodes after we ask them over the mailing list to update. It's not a required PR though, feel free to skip it.

[![CLA assistant check](https://cla-assistant.io/pull/badge/not_signed)](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/c-toxcore?pullRequest=862)
Thank you for your submission, we really appreciate it. Like many open source projects, we ask that you all sign our [Contributor License Agreement](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/c-toxcore?pullRequest=862) before we can accept your contribution.
**1** out of **2** committers have signed the CLA.

:white_check_mark: robinlinden
:x: nurupo
You have signed the CLA already but the status is still pending? Let us [recheck](https://cla-assistant.io/check/TokTok/c-toxcore?pullRequest=862) it.

The release will be without #867 as I can't merge unsigned commits and I can't push to forks based on irungentoo's Toxcore repository. I've cherry-picked the commit fixing the autotools build. There's still lots of discussion going on in #875 and it shouldn't block the release, so that PR will have to wait too.

--- Reviewed 1 of 7 files at r2, 6 of 6 files at r3. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved, some commit checks pending. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/862#-:-LAKgdVX2B1p1s4n0Ia0:b-jbsf8z)*
